item.description: https://www.facebook.... Saturday, December 17, 2011 Time7:00pm until 11:30pm Thank you Massachusetts supporters for all of your help this cycle! This event marks the last major event in the Boston area before the rapidly approaching and very important New Hampshire GOP Primary. The last hurrah before we have to focus exclusively on NH. As far a...s the media is concerned, the purpose of the pub crawl is to promote Ron Paul's HR 1139 "Keep Your Tips Act". Something to keep in mind, if you are ever asked to pay a cover fee mention organizer Carla's name and/or the name of the contact at the respective bar, listed below McFadden’s Pub 148 State Street 7:00-8:15/Kelly Coogan’s 171 Milk Street 8:30 – 9:15/Sheldon Jose McIntyre’s 160 Milk Street 9:30 -10:15/Sheldon Goodbar 183 State Street 10:30 – 11:15/Ann Marie Durgin Park 340 Faneuil Hall Market Pl 11:30 - ?/Felix Our compatriots in New Hampshire have already had similar pub crawls in Manchester, Portsmouth, and Concord. In each case, a respective local newspaper has published the announcement; for example: http://www.concordmon... . And for an idea of how much fun we had that night, check this picture: http://i50.photobucke... !!! event is 21+ if that's not obvious
item.name: Holiday Pub Crawl
